qas.question: Who was a member of American diplomatic and military circles?
What was Alfred Thayer Mahan concerned about?

answers.text: the naval vulnerability of the trade routes

qas.question: When did Alfred Thayer Mahan comment on the trade routes?

context: A second strategic personality from American diplomatic and military circles, <a0_0>Alfred Thayer Mahan<a0_0/>, concerned about <a1_0>the naval vulnerability of the trade routes<a1_0/> in the Persian Gulf and Indian Ocean, commented in <a2_0>1902<a2_0/>:
